title: French Conversations Pratiques de l'oral
description:
CONVERSATIONS:PRATIQUES DE L&#039;ORAL

Authors: C. Martins and J.J. Mabilat.

A true survival guide for anyone living in a French-speaking nation or simply learning French, this book offers 11 chapters of real-life situation and dialogues which not only depict correct phrases, but matches the right phrase to the appropriate level (i.e. polite, standard, familiar). The dialogues also provide frequently-used idiomatic expressions, expressions suited for written correspondence, cultural and linguistic notes. This text corresponds to Levels A1-C1 of the Common European Cadre for the ALTE language exam. 


mp3 and pdf files (complete)
47 mb
